abstrac: Don't create websites for the heck of it. It is your medium to talk to the world. Make it count. Convert visitors to clients.
bio: The Founders Nidhi (http://www.linkedin.com/in/kapoornidhi) and Raunak (www.linkedin.com/in/raunakguha) co-founded RankHigher.in when they were working on their flagship product FounderMates, and failed to identify the right product partner. Most companies work as outsourced vendors and have very bad repute due to their quality of delivery and lack of professionalism,. Having worked with startups in London in various business and product roles, Nidhi and Raunak wanted to bring in all their experience together and create a value added product partner which can help businesses grow. Our motto is simple: Business owners should focus on growing their business and leave their product development to us. We have been running FounderMates through our internal team for a year and we have over 600 users. This is a great testimonial for our success as web and product development partners to SMEs and startups.

We do not take projects unless we have a thorough understanding of the client's business, what they want to achieve and how. Because we believe your online presence is reflective of what you are doing offline. We will work with you and create a plan. Based on the agreed plan, we calculate the number of hours required and  we bill you for that. We charge 20% at the project initiation phase and 80% on final delivery. We are available via Skype/Phone/Email.

bio:

Director of Engineering at AirExpert Technics [http://aogdesk.com/]For each of the above companies, I serve as the software architect, lead programmer, and system administrator.In the past I have been the architect and lead developer for:Planet Ultimate, which was the largest Online Dating property in CanadaRealDeal Online Video PokerEmpire Enhanced Video Broadcasting (winning and award in 2001 for the first enhanced broadcast of an NHL game)ClassifiedsPlus integrated newspaper classifieds call center system Yellow Pages production system, producing the first direct-to-plate phonebook in history
Dream It. Build It. Release It. Repeat.I have been helping business owners and entrepreneurs define their objectives, build their onli

I am a managing partner in several companies, and all of them are united by this Philosophy (which I wrote):We can make money without doing evil.We can be serious without a suit.Work should be challenging and the challenge should be fun.Great just isn't good enough - we always deliver more than expected. Health
and balance is important. We encourage activities that strengthen the
mind, body and spirits of our employees and their families.We avoid real or perceived conflicts of interest whenever possible, and disclose them when they do exist;We are honest and realistic in stating claims or estimates.We seek, accept, and offer honest criticism, acknowledge and correct errors, and credit the contributions of others.We avoid injuring others, their property, reputation, or employment by false or malicious action.We assist colleagues and co-workers in their professional development and support them in following this code of ethics.Our hiring policy is favors ability over education.

abstrac: Let me remove the burdens that creative and administrative cause in your business!
bio:
I am a nationally-certified Virtual Professional who caters to the 
creative and administrative needs of small business owners, 
solopreneurs, and healthcare professionals.

When you allow me to take on tasks for you, you're free to invest your high energy time operating in your strengths and focusing on making money.  To excel means to surpass; and that is what clients can
expect from JIREH VIRTUAL SOLUTIONS.

My payment preferences are SafePay Escrow and PayPal.

Once a project has been accepted and received, I prefer minimal communication (milestone emails mainly), which allows me to focus on your project.

I am available weekdays from 9am until 6pm CST.  Saturday availability is limited and may come at a premium rate.  

When your project has been completed, I would greatly appreciate feedback on my work on both of our profiles.  Thank you.

Lisa M. Bryant, Virtual Professional
Jireh Virtual Solutions

abstrac: We Believe In Quality & Customer Service
bio:
Invortex Technologies, LLC, is dedicated to serving your web presence needs for your business.  Our development know-how combined with our experience in sales and marketing shows that our team is uniquely qualified to deliver truly effective websites, not just pretty ones (but our web designers are rather good at that, too). We understand the ins and outs of website development, but we also understand that the story doesn’t end with the code.

sales@invortex.com
214-550-0505

HOURS OF OPERATION: 

You can reach us after the coffee's done percolating at 9:00 CST until the last drop is gone at 5:00 CST. We can be reached at: 214 550 0505 or visit our website at www.invortex.com


PAYMENT TERMS: 
For fixed price projects; 100% of project amount to be deposited in GURU ESCROW. 50% payments to be released upon approval of the fee agreement and 50% upon completion of the project.

PAYMENT METHODS:
- Guru Escrow
- PayPal
- All Major Credit/ Debit Cards
- Checks

COMMUNICATION: 
We are always available for questions via phone, emails or Skype. 

Feel free to contact us at teamsupport@invortex.com or call us on 214 550 0505 for any web design or development assistance you may need.
